Àtụ:Infobox basketball club
Ndị Lagos Islanders bụ klọb basketball nke Naijiria nke dị na Lagos, nke e hiwere n'afọ 1984
Onye na-ese egwu bụ Sound Sultan kemgbe afọ 2014. Ha na-egwu egwuregwu ha n'ụlọ na Rowe Park Sports Centre na mpaghara Yaba.
N'afọ 2016, ndị Islanders gbara bọọlụ na African Basketball League (ABL)
N'ihi na Nigerian Basketball Federation (NBBF) anabataghị egwuregwu a, a kwụsịtụrụ ha na egwuregwu ime obodo. E wepụrụ mmachibido iwu ahụ n'afọ 2019.
